body.subject: implementation.json created - ws1 completed, coverage 95.45%
body.summary: implementation.json created per consensus_architecture.json::artifacts.implementation schema. Workstream 1 (Domain & Contracts) completed: 2/18 tasks done, coverage 95.45% (required >= 80%), 35 tests passing, mypy and lint clean. Ready for quality review of ws1.
key_points: ws1_t1 (Intent, Skill value objects): coverage 97.73%, 12 tests
Acceptance Criteria AC9 met: Domain layer contains contracts for Intent, TaskPlan, TaskStep, Skill, SkillResult, MemorySnapshot, SafetyViolation
concerns: ws2-ws8 not yet implemented (16 tasks remaining)
Integration tests and smoke tests will be added in subsequent workstreams
Security tests and performance tests will be added per plan.json in ws8
body.action_needed: Conduct quality review for ws1. After approval, proceed with ws2 (Memory Fabric + Persona Merge). Test evidence provided in implementation.json.
